EnumValues: Hold Down and Can Be Disabled

DefaultsByActorName.Hfbot1C: Hold Down and Can Be Disabled

ParameterFields.Name: Disabled Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip: For 'Hold Down and Can Be Disabled' type buttons, they will stop automatically unpressing themselves once this switch is set by something else (even if they haven't been pressed once manually). No effect on other types.
